page.title: 02D.H.S.S.
page.content:
{ {DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND SOCIAL {SECURITY ST PAUL'S HOUSE, MARSHFIELD ROAD, CHIPPENHAM, WILTS.
Pamphlets from the D.H.S.S help people to find what help they can get when they are in need.We asked if we could talk to someone who could tell us how the D.H.S.S works and they sent two people to our school.One person works in the Supplementary Benefits department which arranges extra money for necessities.In 1948 a National Insurance scheme was started.Regular sums of money are deducted from everyone's wages toward paying for the scheme.
